name: ptwikis-abusefilter-graphs

description: Graph showing the actions taken by filters in the last 30 days.

name: ptwikis-matrix
title: Classification Matrix
description: Classify articles about a subject in a matrix, showing how many pages have a certain quality and priority
keywords: table, quality, importance, priority, assessment, class, ptwikis
author: Danilo.mac, Helder

name: ptwikis-common-interwikis
title: Common interwiki articles
description: List of articles that exists in the English Wikipedia without interwiki to a determined language.
keywords: list, popular, articles, interwiki, language, ptwikis
author: Danilo.mac

name: ptwikis-ip-patrol
title: IP Patrolling
description: Graphs of the number of edits, patrolled edits and reverted edits in the last 7 or 30 days.
author: Danilo.mac

name: ptwikis-matrix
title: Matrix of Classification
description: Matrix showing the classification of the articleas about a subject in terms of quality and priority.
keywords: table, quality, priority, assessment, class, featured, good, ptwikis
author: Danilo.mac, Helder

name: ptwikis-mobile
title: Mobile Interface Usage
description: Graph of the edits by registered and unregistered users using the mobile interface in the last 30 days.
author: Danilo.mac

name: ptwikis-lists
title: Page and User Lists
description: Lists of pages or users, based on many criteria (category, template, wikiproject, reversions).
keywords: list, pages, category, template, wikiproject, reversions, ptwikis
author: Danilo.mac

name: ptwikis-short-articles
title: Short Articles
description: Table showing the size, category and last edit of the shortest articles, not considering disambiguations
author: Danilo.mac

name: ptwikis-visual-editor
title: VisualEditor Usage
description: Graph of the edits by registered and unregistered users using VisualEditor in the last 30 days.
author: Danilo.mac

description: Graph of uploads in Wiki Loves Earth 2014 campaign.

name: ptwikis-timeline
